markdownRemark.html:
The 187 Shorey House, one of the oldest in West Oakland, is located across Eight Street. William Shorey, an African American sea captain and civic leader, lived here with his family.

Bay Trail informational sign

More information on William Shorey can be found in Oakland's LocalWiki.

Sources:

  • From the sign near Bertha Port park, marking historical locations along the Bay Trail.
